author: Special Correspondent
text:
Hundreds of members of the Primary Cooperative Societies All Employees’ Association took out a rally highlighting demand for pension and better pay and working conditions.

The rally taken out by the employees of the cooperative societies which started at MGR Statue, culminated at Sampath Nagar.

Demands

Representatives of the association handed over a petition containing their demands to the district administration for routing the same to the State Government. District unit president R. Ilangovan Secretary Mesappan, and other functionaries led the rally.
title: Primary Cooperative Society employees seek pension
